mapper.sql: ss.id stationId, ss.SBS_STATION sbsStation, srs.SBS_DEPART_TIME sbsDepartTime, ss.SBS_DESC sbsDesc
mapper.select: SELECT ss.SBS_STATION stationName, ss.SBS_LONGITUDE longtidue, ss.SBS_LATITUDE latitude, srs.SBS_DEPART_TIME departTime FROM sb_route_station srs LEFT JOIN sb_station ss ON srs.STATION_ID = ss.ID WHERE srs.Valid = 1 and ss.Valid = 1 and srs.ROUTE_ID = #{routeId}

SELECT sb_route.ID routeId, sb_route.SBR_ROUTENAME routeName, sb_station.SBS_STATION stationName, sb_station.SBS_LONGITUDE longitude, sb_station.SBS_LATITUDE latitude, sb_route_station.SBS_DEPART_TIME departTime FROM sb_route_station LEFT JOIN sb_station ON sb_station.ID = sb_route_station.STATION_ID LEFT JOIN sb_route ON sb_route.ID = sb_route_station.ROUTE_ID WHERE sb_route.Valid = 1 AND sb_station.Valid = 1 AND sb_route_station.Valid = 1 ORDER BY sb_route.SBR_ROUTENAME

SELECT rsr.routeId, rsr.routeName, rsr.stationName, rsr.longitude, rsr.latitude, rsr.departTime, sb_bus_route.SBBR_START_TIME startTime, sb_bus_route.SBBR_END_TIME endTime FROM sb_bus_route, ( SELECT sb_route.ID routeId, sb_route.SBR_ROUTENAME routeName, sb_station.SBS_STATION stationName, sb_station.SBS_LONGITUDE longitude, sb_station.SBS_LATITUDE latitude, sb_route_station.SBS_DEPART_TIME departTime FROM sb_route_station LEFT JOIN sb_station ON sb_station.ID = sb_route_station.STATION_ID LEFT JOIN sb_route ON sb_route.ID = sb_route_station.ROUTE_ID WHERE sb_route.Valid = 1 AND sb_station.Valid = 1 AND sb_route_station.Valid = 1 ) rsr WHERE sb_bus_route.Valid = 1 AND sb_bus_route.ROUTE_ID = rsr.routeId AND sb_bus_route.SBBR_WEEK = #{week,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rsr.routeId
